ValidationRule.description: If GL Rating = "Not Complete", then force an entry in the GL Service not setup or the GL not setup correctly fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(GL_Rating__c,"Not Complete"), ( ISBLANK(GL_not_setup_correctly__c) && ISBLANK(GL_Service_not_setup__c) ), $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the GL Service not setup or the GL not setup correctly fields when setting GL Rating = Not Complete.
